About Text:
At Ergode, my leadership as Associate Vice President has been instrumental in driving e-commerce growth, with a strong focus on strategic management and M&A. The foundations laid from managing the Amazon FBA business to overseeing the successful acquisition and integration of the Vizari Brand showcase a dedication to optimizing operations and marketing for sustained profitability.

The team and I have worked together to revolutionize our approach, achieving consistent growth and a remarkable track record in business intelligence. Leveraging skills in Amazon Seller Central and strategic thinking, we've propelled the organization's evolution, with the ultimate goal of continuing our trajectory as a leader in the e-commerce space.

Experience Data.title: Associate Vice President
Experience Data.description:
Led the Amazon FBA Team at VirVentures, overseeing departments including Buying, Vendor Relationship, Operations, Marketing, and Business Intelligence.
Managed the P&L of the VirVentures department, ensuring consistent net profitability for over 30 quarters.
Drove business growth by implementing strategies to increase sales, introduce new products, and expand supplier network. Achieved an average annual growth rate of 30% over the past 9 years.
Played a crucial role in analyzing M&A opportunities, structuring deals, and creating business forecasts. Successfully facilitated the acquisition of 5 brands as an e-Commerce Aggregator.
Headed the Vizari Brand, a major acquisition by Ergode, and achieved over 50% year-on-year sales growth through effective marketing, content management, inventory planning, and product diversification.
Spearheaded recruitment efforts and team building, resulting in the establishment of a 200-member team from scratch.

Experience Data.title: General Manager
Experience Data.description: Achieved corporate growth objectives through providing strategic direction, diverse perspectives and positive leadership.
